name: Tree In Lodge

reviews.text: Stayed here one night while exploring Singapore for the weekend. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the common room was a relaxed place to hang out and chat with other travelers. I stayed in the female dorm, which was quite nice, and was able to get a good night's sleep. The hostel is in a great location - walkable to the MRT, various shopping centers, Little India and Arab St. There are also lots of small restaurants on the block which offer cheap and good food. Overall a great hostel to stay in.
reviews.title: Friendly and comfortable

reviews.text: I stayed in this 'tree' for 3 days. Stayed in the female dorm. Like the other guests mentioned, the staff was really very helpful. They also know their guests, greeting u whenever u go in and out, making u felt welcome. Toilets and shower are always clean. Ladies, a hair dryer is provided in the female toilet. =)
reviews.title: Clean and friendly hostel

reviews.text: Folks here are very considerate. Not much noise at night so u dont have to worry. Partly bcoz the hostel owners really 'educate' their guest.
reviews.title: This place was my style...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is located very near to the mrt station. Lots of food behind the hostel. There are a few nice dessert shops behind the hostel too...
reviews.title: A great little place to stay

reviews.text: I truly enjoyed the stay here... Highly recommended...!!
reviews.title: Interesting green hostel.

reviews.text: This hostel is not only certainly the best option in Singapore, but has been the place of my most pleasant stay in 6 months of travelling throughout Australia and Southeast-Asia.
reviews.title: My favourite throughout Australia and Asia!

reviews.text: Everything is perfectly clean, the hostel is quiet, cozy and located just a few metres off the city centre, surrounded by food stalls and shopping facilities around Bugis Street and Bugis Junction .
reviews.title: Excellent Option in Singapore!

reviews.text: The place is run by two cool and friendly guys, both locals and backpackers themselves.
reviews.title: Good hostel with convenient location and courteous staffs

reviews.text: The two can not only provide information on every place in and around Singapore, but have been travelling throughout most of Malaysia and the rest of Asia. Get the best insider infos for your travels! Besides, there are heeps of cool AND green-minded backpackers around...
reviews.title: My first experience...

reviews.text: I felt almost too safe, as a key card is needed to get both in and and out of the hostel, as well as in order to enter the rooms. I locked myself out several times during my stay, which never was a problem. Lockers are also provided.
reviews.title: FEELS LIKE HOME NOW

reviews.text: I read all the reviews on trip advisor and decided to book this place because of it. I thought the rooms were ok but what made the place was the staff. I received a really nice welcome upon arrival and they couldn't be any more helpful. They told me where to go in Singapore and recommended some great places to eat including the famous Tien Tian chicken rice. The free water was brilliant for filling up my bottle as it is soo humid here. The free laptops and wi-fi helped me out soo much. Good central location too but maybe check google street view before arriving as i got a little lost coming here.
reviews.title: Grew to love this place

reviews.text: I was in Singapore for an exhibition at Suntec. I had my doubts as I have not stayed in many hostels; however, the place has all that I needed for the trip. Not to mention, real friendly and helpful employees! Its location is pretty much the reason why I stayed there and even for leisure travelers, it's perfectly located in a convenient area close to Suntec, Bugis, and other spots. Definitely will be thinking of Tree In Lodge in my next trip to Singapore.
reviews.title: Can't ask for more

reviews.text: 1. Friendly owners. Very helpful. They're so willing to help with directions and they even recommend places that are really must-see in Singapore. They sell tickets for cheaper price. All in all, they are awesome!
reviews.title: Tree In Lodge: Best Choice

reviews.text: 2. Affordable yet so clean and comfortable. Feels like you're still at home. It has free internet connection and you can use the laptops in the common area, for free!
reviews.title: Brilliant hostel

reviews.text: 3. Yummy breakfast :)
reviews.title: touched!

reviews.text: We chose Tree in Lodge as we have a family of 5 and there weren't many hotels that were willing to give us a triple room for our kids. Tree in Lodge also gave our young teens a chance to experience backpacker travelling. We stayed 5 nights total in December. Except for the first night when our family was split, we managed to book out the whole 6-bed dorm for ourselves for the next 4 nights. The kids thought it was like bunking at school camp!
reviews.title: Cheap & friendly stay in Singapore

reviews.text: Thank you very much Yong & SK for sharing your tips and where to eat the best chicken rice, har mee and laksa. I truly enjoyed my fill of Singaporean hawker food. The central location of this Lodge to the shops at Bugis and Little Arab, Little India and Chinatown was also great. Also loved the free WiFi and the carrom board - I got to play a few games against hubby and taught our kids how to play it too.
reviews.title: Still the best clean environment friendly backpack guesthouse~ Do remember to switch of the switch if your are not using

reviews.text: One small caveat: I wish the beds were a little softer.
reviews.title: I saw Green . . . but even more I saw Friendly Service

reviews.text: Our older extended family could not understand why we wanted to live at this Lodge (a hostel, really??), but for me, it turned out to be one of the best things about our trip to Singapore.
reviews.title: Feels Like Home!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Is my second time at Tree In Lodge within a year~ Warm welcome from the guys even-though is rainy in Singapore during the Christmas season and is still a wonderful place to hop-in for few nights stay where is so convenient~ Shopping Centre~ Food Juctions~ Coach~ Bus~ Mrt~ and dont forget~ Malaysia most favourite place where you wanna get is 7-11 :P
reviews.title: Great alternative choice!

description: An environmentally-friendly and cosy backpackers' lodge by backpackers located in the heart of the city, and comes with free Internet access and breakfasts. Also comes with a female-only dormitory, toilets and shower facilities.
